title: Price Reduced - FS: T206 Polar Bears
author: x2drich2000

posts.post_title: Price Reduced - FS: T206 Polar Bears
posts.post_content:
Have for sale the following T206 Polar Bears for sale.  Conditions vary.  Asking $30 each.  Shipping is $3 regardless of number of cards purchased.  Will potentially consider trades for E92, T222, HOFers, or anything else that strikes me.  Payment - check, postal money order, or Paypal friends & family. Regular Paypal, add an additional 3% to cover the fees. First to commit to purchase gets the card. Any questions, please let me know. 

Thanks
DJ
